short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search within a website using its own search engine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will attempt to use a site's internal search engine to find search results. If it cannot, it will use your browser's default search engine.

Search for selected text:
Select the text you would like to search for, right-click to bring up the context menu, click "Search This Site".

Freeform search:
Type "STS" in the address bar and press Tab. Type your search query and press Enter.

Due to restrictions built into the browser, this extension is inoperable on the Chrome Web Store.
